text:
#IntoAmerica: As the 2020 DNC has come to a close, did the Democrats do enough to connect with young Black voters?  

.@trymainelee talks to activist @JamiraBurley, who hopes the party will seize on opportunities to inspire young voters of color.

text:
When founders promised to commit 100% of raised funds to charity, they opened themselves up to scrutiny.

A 100% promise is so difficult to achieve, and so unlikely to accomplish, that the pledge itself is a red flag to investigators. https://t.co/ObyseojIGN
